text: Sir Toke Tufukia Talagi (9 January 1951 â€“ 15 July 2020) was a Niuean politician, diplomat and statesman. He served as Premier of Niue from 2008 to 2020. Talagi was born in Alofi. On 15 July 2020, Talagi died in Alofi at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians Category:Premiers of Niue
title: Toke Talagi
